title: Powers of Presidency Expanding Domestic Policy

content.question: Over time, the powers of the presidency have greatly expanded in the area of domestic policy. Take a position on whether the expansion of presidential powers facilitates or hinders effective domestic policy. Use at least one piece of evidence from one of the following foundational documents: The Declaration of Independence The Federalist 10 The Federalist 70 In your response you should do the following: ✓ Respond to the prompt with a defensible claim or thesis that establishes a line of reasoning. ✓ Support your claim with at least TWO pieces of specific and relevant evidence. • One piece of evidence must come from one of the foundational documents listed above. • A second piece of evidence can come from any other foundational document not used as your first piece of evidence, or it may come from your knowledge of course concepts. ✓ Use reasoning to explain why your evidence supports your claim or thesis.
